title: Looking for silver flex Q team
body: I am silver 4 and can play every role consistently with mid and support being my best. I'm tired of having teammates who have no idea what they are doing. If you are in need of a player, hit me up. -Traloop

replies.body:
Hi Traloop, 

My name is Huskey and I'm a staff member for the gaming community AGC. Noticed your post while I was browsing the boards and I thought I might share our discord link with you, https://discord.gg/4uuGk. We also organise flex queue teams within the community, I'm almost certain you'll find what you're looking for here.

If you would like more information on the flex queue teams, or where to sign up check our boards post[ here:](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/1KHrBFWU-agc-ranked-team-recruitment)
